body: Very cute, need part 4 and translation

That Yuina thinks Tosio hates him too is even more incredulous than reverse. At least Yuina acted angrily with Tosio and avoided the latter after those two times sex, but imagine Yuina's thoughts here: “I am a super popular person; I'm in love with this person whom I somehow ended up having sex with who tries to talk to me later... he probably hates me; let's act full tundere with him.” — At least Tosio's perspective was “I came close to raping my crush who is super popular, but in that moment he seemed to enjoy it even though he acted a bit tundere during it, but now, after the moment when I talk to him he's angry with me... understandable.. I ruined everythig.” — At least that makes some degree of sense to think it's not mutual.
i hope more kinokonomi works got translated
So kawaiiiii, hope this gets translated soon
